mapper.insert: insert into user_mst values( 0, #{email}, #{name}, #{username}, #{oAuth2_username}, #{password}, #{roles}, #{provider}, now(), now() );
mapper.select: select um.*, ud.profile_img_url from user_mst um left outer join user_dtl ud on(ud.usercode =um.usercode) where username = #{username};
select um.*, ud.profile_img_url from user_mst um left outer join user_dtl ud on(ud.usercode =um.usercode) where oAuth2_username = #{oAuth2_username};
